events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and are impressed by their background.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to keywords such as software and developer found in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in technology roles has been assigned to oversee the candidate's process moving forward.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully with the candidate expressing enthusiasm and strong technical knowledge.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview and showing eagerness to proceed.
A technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team set on May 15th.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills and coding ability.
Following the successful technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss culture fit and benefits.
The HR interview went well with the candidate expressing alignment with company values and interest in the role.
An offer letter has been prepared and proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested clarification on some benefits.
Candidate accepted the offer enthusiastically and confirmed their start date for onboarding in early June.
Onboarding process has started with the candidate completing all required documentation and introductions.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
